title: DeLille Vineyards Tasting
description:
Join us on Wednesday, September 24, from 4–7 PM at Whispering Vine South Creek for a tasting featuring the acclaimed wines of DeLille Vineyards, a Washington winery celebrated for its Bordeaux-inspired blends and elegant whites.

Tasting Fee: $30 (Buy a bottle from the tasting and your fee is refunded)

Featured Wines:

• DeLille D2 Estate Red 2022 – 93 pts Robert Parker, 92 pts Vinous, 91 pts Jeb Dunnuck – Merlot-driven Bordeaux blend with layers of blackberry, lavender, herbs, and mineral-laced elegance.

• DeLille Chaleur Blanc 2023 – 94 pts Jeb Dunnuck, 93 pts Vinous, 91 pts Wine Spectator – Barrel-aged Sauvignon Blanc/Semillon blend with notes of citrus, stone fruit, honey, and flinty minerality.

• DeLille Métier Cabernet Sauvignon 2021 – 91 pts Jeb Dunnuck, 91 pts Wine Spectator, 91 pts James Suckling – Structured yet approachable Cabernet with cassis, herbs, and a refined, balanced finish.

• DeLille Métier Sauvignon Blanc 2023 – 91 pts Robert Parker, 91 pts Jeb Dunnuck – Fresh and vibrant with white peach, citrus blossom, tropical fruit, and crisp acidity.

Experience the finesse and balance of Washington winemaking at its best—buy a bottle and your tasting is free.
